21.60.text: and they started building in 1699, and the east wing centre block

25.60.text: was completed by 1714 and the west wing wasn't

28.72.text: started until the 1750's and the completion wasn't until

33.30.text: But during that period pictures of course pictures had already begun to be collected.

37.50.text: So the whole house is hung with a great many oils

40.38.text: and about a third of the pictures were lit

49.32.text: And these involved using 30 watt incandescent bulbs.

53.50.text: When we re-hung the main showrooms

57.07.text: we also lit all the pictures then, and it came to

61.14.text: the rather regrettable position that we were actually replacing about

64.91.text: 12 of these incandescent lights a week and at £12 each you can imagine what the cost was.

70.86.text: So in 2009 we started looking at it all

74.00.text: and decided what we were going to do. In 2010 I was put in touch with Dr Wyn-Davies

78.80.text: at DFx and he came and showed me some samples.

82.91.text: We decided on the colour range we wanted which was about 2100k

86.56.text: and we tested a few, well they

89.85.text: looked excellent in fact and they were a very good replacement for the incandescents.

95.37.text: When we re-hung the whole of the south front this brought

98.94.text: total number of bulbs required up to about 300.

102.90.text: So we decided to replace the whole lot in one go. And over the period of about a week,

107.37.text: two people went round replacing all these.

110.43.text: The Result has been absolutely astonishing, as we have not had to replace

117.70.text: From a financial point of view, it makes complete sense and the saving we make on electricity every year is huge.

123.60.text: The cost of replacing all the bulbs

126.40.text: more then paid for itself in 3 months, that's the astonishing thing,

130.87.text: because if you think about it when we were replacing all the incandescent,

133.90.text: if you add up that cost, its easily covered by the replacement bulbs.

139.20.text: And so we're extremely pleased with what we have here, all the oil paintings are now lit and as I say

146.00.text: no replacements needed in two years.
